channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Amazon Prime Day Baby Deals (2025): Car Seats, Strollers, and More
item.description: Need a new car seat or stroller? There are only hours left of Prime Big Deal Days—don't miss these sales.

item.title: The Petkit Eversweet Max 2 Is $23 Off Right Now
item.description: The Petkit Eversweet Max is 25 percent off right now for Prime Big Deal Days.

item.title: Amazon Pharmacy is launching vending machines for prescription drugs
item.description: The kiosks have a range of commonly prescribed medications, including antibiotics, inhalers, and blood pressure medications.

item.title: We Found 217 of the Best Prime Day Deals Still on for 2025: Up To 55% Off
item.description: Time is running out—don’t miss Amazon's fall 2025 Prime Day sale deals on WIRED-tested favorites like Kindles, laptops, Apple Watches, robot vacs, and...

item.title: OpenAI’s Nick Turley on transforming ChatGPT into an operating system
item.description: In an interview, OpenAI's Head of ChatGPT discusses the company's push into developing an AI operating system full of third-party apps.

item.title: Sora’s downloads in its first week was nearly as big as ChatGPT’s launch
item.description: This level of consumer adoption is worth noting because Sora remains an invite-only app, while ChatGPT was more publicly available at launch. That mak...

item.title: The Best Anti-Prime Day Deals for Amazon Haters (2025): Sheets, Sex Tech, and Fire Pits
item.description: You don't have to shop Amazon Big Deal Days to save on WIRED-approved favorites.

item.title: Elon Musk will settle $128M lawsuit with former Twitter execs
item.description: The four executives never received severance payments, which they claim is because they tried to hold Musk to his $44 billion commitment when he tried...

item.title: Fans Call on Taylor Swift to ‘Do Better’ After Accusations of Using AI for Promo Videos
item.description: A scavenger hunt campaign to promote Taylor Swift’s new album, The Life of a Showgirl, resulted in a viral #SwiftiesAgainstAI campaign.

item.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
item.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to phone unlocking technology and databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.
